TEXT.TITLE: WALL STREET STOCKS LOWER IN LATE TRADING
TEXT.BODY: Wall Street stock prices were pounded lower late this afternoon by futures related sell programs and strong profit taking. A weak bond market ignited concern about rising interest rates and inflation, triggering the selloff, traders said. The Dow Industrials fell 39 points to 2367. Reuter
